주성분영문: Anhydrous Dibasic Calcium Phosphate/Dibasic Calcium Phosphate Hydrate/Sodium Monofluorophosphate/Sage Oil
Tribasic Calcium Phosphate/Tocopherol Acetate/Dental Type Silica
Precipitated Calcium Carbonate/Dibasic Calcium Phosphate Hydrate/Aluminium Chlorohydroxy Allantoinate
Sodium Monofluorophosphate/Dental Type Silica/Potassium Phosphate, Monobasic/Dibasic Potassium Phosphate/Calcium Carbonate/Zinc Chloride/Tocopherol Acetate

제품명: 시마새부리형포근이황사보건용마스크(KF94)(대형)(흰색, 검정색, 연한회색, 진한회색, 상아색, 연한갈색, 진한녹색, 연한분홍색)
시마새부리형황사보건용마스크(KF94)(대형)(흰색, 검정색, 연한회색, 진한회색, 상아색, 연한갈색, 진한녹색, 연한분홍색)

주성분영문: Potassium Nitrate/Aluminium Lactate/Sodium Monofluorophosphate/Dental Type Silica
Sodium Fluoride/Isopropyl Methylphenol/Dipotassium Glycyrrhizinate/Dental Type Silica

첨가제: 폴리프로필렌부직포(검정색),폴리프로필렌 필터 부직포,고정용 귀끈,폴리우레탄나일론끈(검정색),마스크용 부직포,플라스틱 코편
